aka: Days Inn Camelback Phoenix Hotel Phoenix
description: The Camelback Sahara Hotel is at the heart of The Melrose District just 7 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. Conveniently located just 1 block from the 7th Ave. Metro station, providing access to all points of interest including The Phoenix Convention Center, downtown sports and theater venues, museums, shopping, and Sky Harbor Intl. Our enormous pool area provides a great space to relax and soak in the Arizona sun. Rooms are furnished with plush mattresses along with all the pillows you could want, flat screen tv's, in-room Keurig coffee makers, and a hot fresh breakfast every morning. We also have meeting space available that can accommodate up to 350 guests.
